reference.shortdesc: The choicetable element contains a series of optional choices available within a step of a task.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: By default, processors highlight the choice column using bold. To change the highlighting, set the keycol attribute of the choicetable tag to 0 (zero).

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The choicetable element is specialized from the simpletable element in the topic module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p:
